Package Battleship.Controller

package Battleship.Controller
This package contains all classes relating to controlling a Battleship game.

The classes in this package handle the interactions between the game model and the game IO.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
0.2.2
Author:
Garrett Kamila Crayton
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Battleship
    This system simulates playing a game of Battleship between two players.
    Battleship.game
    This package contains all classes that model a game of Battleship.
    Battleship.GameIO
    This package contains all classes to handle all IO for the game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    Controller class for a full game of Battleship.
    PlacementTurn
    Represents a single turn for placing every Ship in a Player's Fleet
    Turn
    Represents a single turn
    TurnController
    Abstract class that handles overall turn operations
